file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 25-40-02-03 - LAVATORY DOOR LOCK - SERVICING

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL LAVATORY DOOR LOCK - SERVICING EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the general instructions to lubricate the lavatory door components. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ALL 25-40-02-600-801-A LAVATORY DOOR- LUBRICATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 25-40-02 Page 1 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 25-40-02-600-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. LAVATORY DOOR- LUBRICATION A. General WARNING: THE SOLVENT CONTAINS POISONOUS AGENTS. PUT ON GLOVES WHEN YOU USE IT AND DO NOT LET IT TOUCH YOUR SKIN OR EYES. HAVE A SUFFICIENT FLOW OF AIR OR USE RESPIRATORS. (1) For a satisfactory result, it is most important to fully clean the parts before you lubricate them. Before you apply the lubricant, clean all metallic moving parts to remove dust, grease, and oil. (2) Dust and sand, mixed with grease or oil, cause a grinding mixture which can cause bad damage to moving parts. (3) Before you lubricate, it is necessary to remove all old grease, oil, and dust with a cloth moist with solvent MIL-PRF-680. B. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable C. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable D. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Rubber Gloves To protect the hands AR available E. Consumable Materials SPECIFICATION DESCRIPTION QTY (BRAND) MIL-L-7808 Oil AR MIL-PRF-680 Solvent AR F. Expandable Parts Not Applicable G. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Lavatory door H. Lavatory Door Latch - Lubrication (Figure 301) SUBTASK 640-002-A (1) Lift the hinged lavatory sign assembly. Refer to Det. B,Figure 301 EMB-145 - AMM 1285 600-801-A/300 25-40-02 Page 2 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (2) Lubricate the lavatory door latch with Molykote 7808 or equivalent. Refer to Det. B,Figure 301. NOTE: Do not lubricate the rod and the escutcheon plate. Refer to Det. C and D, Figure 301. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 600-801-A/300 25-40-02 Page 3 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
